title: The Heirloom
description: Uncover the secrets of your family and your grandfather's old lighthouse as you seek the truth behind the unusual happenings in The Heirloom, a mysterious thriller adventure inspired by the atmosphere of the Hebrides and Scottish folklore!
longDescription:

<!--title-->
# Reviews
<!--text-->
*“Gorgeous, visually stunning adventure!”*
**GamesRadar**

*“The art style reminds me so much of the old-school adventure horror games which I was and still am a big fan of. I can’t wait to see more of this game. Everything I’ve seen from it has managed to captivate me.”*
**HORRORVISUALS**

*“Sincerely, I find the artistic direction top-notch, with a unique character design and excellent ideas that bode well for an interesting and promising game.”*
**VeuillezPLP**

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**The Heirloom** is a single-player **mysterious thriller adventure** with puzzle elements, where players are given the opportunity to make fateful decisions while navigating through a story **full of secrets and mysteries**.

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-smhw6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-smhw6.png)

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-4hrzb](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-4hrzb.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Immerse** yourself in the history of the town as you **interact with the locals and any items** you may find. **Uncover the secrets** of your family and your grandfather’s old lighthouse as you work to **discover the truth** behind the unusual happenings.

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-1rjf0](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-1rjf0.jpg)

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-5aug7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-5aug7.png)

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-r802m](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-r802m.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Not everything can be obtained easily!** Solve various puzzles to **learn** a little **more than you should** and move on. **Search for useful items**, combine and **use them wisely** to achieve your goals.

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-1yduc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-1yduc.jpg)

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-z4d62](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-z4d62.png)

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-1j1ng](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-1j1ng.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**Which path will you choose:** follow the rules or go against them? Trust your heart or follow your mind? **Every word** you say and **every action** you take will definitely **have consequences**.

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-1w08b](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-1w08b.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
- A **mysterious story** inspired by the **atmosphere of the Hebrides** and **Scottish folklore**
- Interesting, touching, sometimes eccentric and funny **dialogues**
- **Each decision** you make **affects the plot** and can lead to unpredictable results
- Stunning **hand-drawn graphics** and fascinating **interactive cutscenes**
- **Unique** and **exciting** combinations of **game mechanics**

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-1rlpo](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-1rlpo.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# MARLA MOIR
<!--text-->
**REBECCA WANG** • Guillermo del Toro’s *Tales of Arcadia* | *Jurassic World Camp Cretaceous* | *Blue Eye Samurai* (Netflix) | *Steps* (Netflix)

Marla is the **protagonist** of *The Heirloom*, a 16-year-old teenage girl and **the eldest daughter of the Moir family**. She is **sarcastic, stubborn, and determined**. Her favorite pastime is **writing little horror stories** in her notebook, which she uses to scare her younger brother, **Jack**, when he **greatly annoys her**. Despite her sometimes seemingly selfish and harmful behavior, is it truly so?

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-e14nx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-e14nx.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# JACK MOIR
<!--text-->
**REBECCA WANG** • Guillermo del Toro’s *Tales of Arcadia* | *Jurassic World Camp Cretaceous* | *Blue Eye Samurai* (Netflix) | *Steps* (Netflix)

Jack is a **loyal companion** and an **expert in every field**, as well as **Marla’s** 10-year-old **younger brother**. He is still very young but highly inquisitive and intelligent, which makes him doubly a **thorn in Marla’s side**. Whether it's rocks, plants, or all sorts of insects, Jack is right there.

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-1xs3m](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-1xs3m.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# MORVIN MOIR
<!--text-->
**ANDY MACK** • *Evil West* | *Dying Light 2* | *Foolish Mortals* | *Postal 4*

Morvin is the **sole living relative** who agreed to take custody of his two orphaned grandchildren. He is a **reclusive, grumpy**, and **rather peculiar old man** who **conceals something terrifying** within the walls of his house. It appears that the only things to which he is even remotely loyal are **chocolate chip biscuits** and **scary black birds** with red eyes, which seem to be exceedingly unfriendly to everyone except him.

<!--image-->
![The Heirloom-5u9ce](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/e702bff322f942dda862add05dbbf6b9/the-heirloom-5u9ce.jpg)
